title: Designing Academic Information Literacy Education Utilizing Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in a personal laptop/BYOD environment, with project-based assessments to strengthen practical skills

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more types of prompts for academic information search and analysis using generative AI tools
Learners can explain the application of mathematical logic structures to information source evaluation and credibility verification processes
Learners can recognize limitations of AI-generated content and propose human-AI collaboration strategies in mathematical problem-solving processes
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
